1)How do i make some mutly combat areas?? 2)How do i change the exp u get by killing monsters or skilling? [s]3)I need to let my npc's auto spawn bud i dont got the autospawn.cfg[/s] 4)how do i make new commands? 5)I need a new right: Donator

item.title: ::HELP::317::i got 5 questions ::317::HELP::-requested by mod...-
item.dc:creator: @King_Lingerz King Lingerz
item.description:
@King_Lingerz wrote:

Help my? You mean me, right?

  1. Get the area coordinates and declare a boolean, then use it as you please.
  2. Explain yourself, do you mean combat or objects or what?
  3. You should do, if not then look around, it might be named differently.
  4. Damn, that’s so easy I’m not even going to reply. THINK before you post.
  5. I think I’ve seen a tutorial for this before, try Google.

Read full topic
